title: Big TV Show Raises Money for Kids
summary: A special TV show called Children in Need 2025 raised a lot of money, over £45 million, to help children who need support. Famous singers and TV stars like Lewis Capaldi and people from shows like Strictly Come Dancing, The Apprentice, and Gladiators were on the program. They performed and asked people to donate money. This event happens every year to make sure kids have food, clothes, and fun things. It's a happy time when everyone comes together to help others. The money will go to charities that work with children across the country. This shows how kind people can be when they work as a team.

background_read: Children in Need is a big charity event in the UK that happens every year on TV. It started a long time ago to help kids who are sick, poor, or facing hard times. Celebrities join in to sing, dance, and ask people to give money. The money goes to many charities that support children with things like education, health, and fun activities. It's a way for everyone to come together and make a difference in children's lives.
